languages.text: "Тогда я пойду одна". {n}В спокойном и тихом голосе эльдарки не слышно ни мольбы, ни упрека. Лишь стальная решимость.{/n} "И лишь когда отыщу росток истины в темных сводах шпиля, мы воссоединимся вновь".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда я пойду одна". {n}В спокойном и тихом голосе эльдарки не слышно ни мольбы, ни упрека. Лишь стальная решимость.{/n} "И лишь когда отыщу росток истины в темных сводах шпиля, мы воссоединимся вновь".

languages.text: "Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without any hint of a plea or reproach. All you can hear is unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the germ of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."
languages.original_text: "Тогда я пойду одна". {n}В спокойном и тихом голосе эльдарки не слышно ни мольбы, ни упрека. Лишь стальная решимость.{/n} "И лишь когда отыщу росток истины в темных сводах шпиля, мы воссоединимся вновь".

traits.locale_text: "Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without a hint of a plea or a reproach. All you can hear is an unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the sprout of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

"Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without a hint of a plea or a reproach. All you can hear is an unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the sprout of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

"Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without a hint of a plea or a reproach. All you can hear is an unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the sprout of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

"Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without a hint of a plea or a reproach. All you can hear is an unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the sprout of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

"Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without any hint of a plea or reproach. All you can hear is unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the germ of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

"Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without any hint of a plea or reproach. All you can hear is unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the germ of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

languages.text: « J'irai seule dans ce cas. » {n}Sa voix est calme et posée, sans la moindre trace de reproche ou de supplication. Seule sa détermination inébranlable transparaît.{/n} « Une fois que j'aurai trouvé les germes de la vérité dans les salles obscures de la tour, nous nous retrouverons. »
languages.original_text: "Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without any hint of a plea or reproach. All you can hear is unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the germ of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

traits.locale_text: « J'irai seule dans ce cas. » {n}Sa voix est calme et posée, sans la moindre trace de reproche ou de supplication. Seule sa détermination inébranlable transparaît.{/n} « Une fois que j'aurai trouvé les germes de la vérité dans les salles obscures de la tour, nous nous retrouverons. »

languages.text: “那我就一个人去吧。”{n}她的声音充满了平静，没有一丝恳求或责备的意味，你听到的只有不可动摇的决心。{/n}“当我在黑暗的尖塔大厅中找到真理的萌芽之后，再与你重逢吧。”
languages.original_text: "Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without any hint of a plea or reproach. All you can hear is unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the germ of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

traits.locale_text: “那我就一个人去吧。”{n}她的声音充满了平静，没有一丝恳求或责备的意味，你听到的只有不可动摇的决心。{/n}“当我在黑暗的大厅中找到真理的萌芽之后，再与你重逢吧。”

languages.text: 「それなら、私ひとりで行く」{n}彼女の声は穏やかで、懇願や非難の含みは微塵も感じられない。そこから感じられるのは揺るぎない決意だけだ。{/n}「私が尖塔の暗き広間で真実の芽を見つけたら、また再会するとしよう」
languages.original_text: "Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without any hint of a plea or reproach. All you can hear is unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the germ of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、私ひとりで行く」{n}彼女の声は穏やかで、懇願や非難の含みは微塵も感じられない。そこから感じられるのは揺るぎない決意だけだ。{/n}「私が尖塔の暗き広間で真実の芽を見つけたら、また再会するとしよう」

languages.text: "Dann werde ich alleine gehen." {n}Ihre Stimme klingt ruhig und leise, du bemerkst nicht mal den Hauch einer Bitte oder eines Vorwurfs. Zu hören ist nichts als unerschütterliche Entschlossenheit.{/n} "Wir kommen erst wieder zusammen, wenn ich in den dunklen Hallen des Turms den Keim der Wahrheit gefunden habe."
languages.original_text: "Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without any hint of a plea or reproach. All you can hear is unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the germ of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werde ich alleine gehen." {n}Ihre Stimme klingt ruhig und leise, du bemerkst nicht mal den Hauch einer Bitte oder eines Vorwurfs. Zu hören ist nichts als unerschütterliche Entschlossenheit.{/n} "Wir kommen erst wieder zusammen, wenn ich in den dunklen Hallen des Turms die Wahrheit gefunden habe."

languages.text: «Entonces iré yo sola». {n}Su voz es serena y suave, desprovista de súplica o reproche alguno. Lo único que notas en ella es una determinación inquebrantable.{/n} «No volveremos a vernos hasta que haya encontrado el ápice de verdad que ocultan las oscuras estancias de esta torre».
languages.original_text: "Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without any hint of a plea or reproach. All you can hear is unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the germ of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces iré yo sola». {n}Su voz es serena y suave, desprovista de súplica o reproche. Lo único que notas en ella es una determinación inquebrantable.{/n} «No volveremos a vernos hasta que haya encontrado el ápice de verdad que ocultan las oscuras estancias de esta torre».

languages.text: "O hâlde kendim gidiyorum." {n}Sesi hafif ve sakin. İçinde ne bir ısrar ne de bir sitem var. Tek duyabildiğin, sarsılmaz bir kararlılık.{/n} "Kulenin karanlık koridorlarında gerçeğin tohumlarını bir bulayım, sonra yeniden bir araya gelebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Then I will go alone." {n}Her voice is calm and quiet, without any hint of a plea or reproach. All you can hear is unshakeable resolve.{/n} "Only after I have found the germ of truth within the spire's dark halls will we reunite."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde kendim gidiyorum." {n}Sesi hafif ve sakin. İçinde ne bir ısrar izi var ne de bir sitem. Tek duyabildiğin, sarsılmaz bir kararlılık.{/n} "Kulenin karanlık koridorlarında gerçeğin tohumlarını bulmamın ardından yeniden bir araya gelebiliriz."
